author: John Kennedy
message: Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.
title: Thought of the day

author: Marcus Aurelius
message: You have power over your mind not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
title: Thought of the day

author: Louis Pasteur
message: Let me tell you the secret that has led me to my goal: my strength lies solely in my tenacity.
title: Thought of the day

author: Buddha
message: We are what we think. All that we are arises with our thoughts. With our thoughts, we make the world.
title: Thought of the day
